And the LORD<S>3068</S> spake<S>1696</S> unto Moses<S>4872</S>, saying<S>559</S>,
Speak<S>1696</S> unto Aaron<S>175</S>, and say<S>559</S> unto him, When thou lightest<S>5927</S> the lamps<S>5216</S>, the seven<S>7651</S> lamps<S>5216</S> shall give light<S>215</S> over against<S>6440</S> <S>4136</S> the candlestick<S>4501</S>.
And Aaron<S>175</S> did<S>6213</S> so; he lighted<S>5927</S> the lamps<S>5216</S> thereof over against<S>4136</S> <S>6440</S> the candlestick<S>4501</S>, as the LORD<S>3068</S> commanded<S>6680</S> Moses<S>4872</S>.
And this work<S>4639</S> of the candlestick<S>4501</S> was of beaten<S>4749</S> gold<S>2091</S>, unto the shaft<S>3409</S> thereof, unto the flowers<S>6525</S> thereof, was beaten work<S>4749</S>: according unto the pattern<S>4758</S> which the LORD<S>3068</S> had shewed<S>7200</S> Moses<S>4872</S>, so he made<S>6213</S> the candlestick<S>4501</S>.
And the LORD<S>3068</S> spake<S>1696</S> unto Moses<S>4872</S>, saying<S>559</S>,
Take<S>3947</S> the Levites<S>3881</S> from among<S>8432</S> the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, and cleanse<S>2891</S> them.
And thus shalt thou do<S>6213</S> unto them, to cleanse<S>2891</S> them: Sprinkle<S>5137</S> water<S>4325</S> of purifying<S>2403</S> upon them, and let them shave<S>8593</S> <S>5674</S> all their flesh<S>1320</S>, and let them wash<S>3526</S> their clothes<S>899</S>, and so make themselves clean<S>2891</S>. <sup>let them shave: Heb. let them cause a razor to pass over, etc</sup>
Then let them take<S>3947</S> a young<S>1121</S> <S>1241</S> bullock<S>6499</S> with his meat offering<S>4503</S>, even fine flour<S>5560</S> mingled<S>1101</S> with oil<S>8081</S>, and another<S>8145</S> young<S>1121</S> <S>1241</S> bullock<S>6499</S> shalt thou take<S>3947</S> for a sin offering<S>2403</S>.
And thou shalt bring<S>7126</S> the Levites<S>3881</S> before<S>6440</S> the tabernacle<S>168</S> of the congregation<S>4150</S>: and thou shalt gather<S>6950</S> the whole assembly<S>5712</S> of the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> together<S>6950</S>:
And thou shalt bring<S>7126</S> the Levites<S>3881</S> before<S>6440</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>: and the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> shall put<S>5564</S> their hands<S>3027</S> upon the Levites<S>3881</S>:
And Aaron<S>175</S> shall offer<S>5130</S> the Levites<S>3881</S> before<S>6440</S> the LORD<S>3068</S> for an offering<S>8573</S> of the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, that they may execute<S>5647</S> the service<S>5656</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S>. <sup>offer: Heb. wave</sup> <sup>offering: Heb. wave offering</sup> <sup>they: Heb. they may be to execute, etc</sup>
And the Levites<S>3881</S> shall lay<S>5564</S> their hands<S>3027</S> upon the heads<S>7218</S> of the bullocks<S>6499</S>: and thou shalt offer<S>6213</S> the one<S>259</S> for a sin offering<S>2403</S>, and the other<S>259</S> for a burnt offering<S>5930</S>, unto the LORD<S>3068</S>, to make an atonement<S>3722</S> for the Levites<S>3881</S>.
And thou shalt set<S>5975</S> the Levites<S>3881</S> before<S>6440</S> Aaron<S>175</S>, and before<S>6440</S> his sons<S>1121</S>, and offer<S>5130</S> them for an offering<S>8573</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S>.
Thus shalt thou separate<S>914</S> the Levites<S>3881</S> from among<S>8432</S> the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>: and the Levites<S>3881</S> shall be mine.
And after<S>310</S> that shall the Levites<S>3881</S> go in<S>935</S> to do the service<S>5647</S> of the tabernacle<S>168</S> of the congregation<S>4150</S>: and thou shalt cleanse<S>2891</S> them, and offer<S>5130</S> them for an offering<S>8573</S>.
For they are wholly given<S>5414</S> unto me from among<S>8432</S> the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>; instead of such as open<S>6363</S> every womb<S>7358</S>, even instead of the firstborn<S>1060</S> of all the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, have I taken<S>3947</S> them unto me.
For all the firstborn<S>1060</S> of the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> are mine, both man<S>120</S> and beast<S>929</S>: on the day<S>3117</S> that I smote<S>5221</S> every firstborn<S>1060</S> in the land<S>776</S> of Egypt<S>4714</S> I sanctified<S>6942</S> them for myself.
And I have taken<S>3947</S> the Levites<S>3881</S> for all the firstborn<S>1060</S> of the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>.
And I have given<S>5414</S> the Levites<S>3881</S> as a gift<S>5414</S> to Aaron<S>175</S> and to his sons<S>1121</S> from among<S>8432</S> the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, to do<S>5647</S> the service<S>5656</S> of the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> in the tabernacle<S>168</S> of the congregation<S>4150</S>, and to make an atonement<S>3722</S> for the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>: that there be no plague<S>5063</S> among the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, when the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> come nigh<S>5066</S> unto the sanctuary<S>6944</S>. <sup>a gift: Heb. given</sup>
And Moses<S>4872</S>, and Aaron<S>175</S>, and all the congregation<S>5712</S> of the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, did<S>6213</S> to the Levites<S>3881</S> according unto all that the LORD<S>3068</S> commanded<S>6680</S> Moses<S>4872</S> concerning the Levites<S>3881</S>, so did<S>6213</S> the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> unto them.
And the Levites<S>3881</S> were purified<S>2398</S>, and they washed<S>3526</S> their clothes<S>899</S>; and Aaron<S>175</S> offered<S>5130</S> them as an offering<S>8573</S> before<S>6440</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>; and Aaron<S>175</S> made an atonement<S>3722</S> for them to cleanse<S>2891</S> them.
And after<S>310</S> that went<S>935</S> the Levites<S>3881</S> in to do<S>5647</S> their service<S>5656</S> in the tabernacle<S>168</S> of the congregation<S>4150</S> before<S>6440</S> Aaron<S>175</S>, and before<S>6440</S> his sons<S>1121</S>: as the LORD<S>3068</S> had commanded<S>6680</S> Moses<S>4872</S> concerning the Levites<S>3881</S>, so did<S>6213</S> they unto them.
And the LORD<S>3068</S> spake<S>1696</S> unto Moses<S>4872</S>, saying<S>559</S>,
This is it that belongeth unto the Levites<S>3881</S>: from twenty<S>6242</S> and five<S>2568</S> years<S>8141</S> old<S>1121</S> and upward<S>4605</S> they shall go in<S>935</S> to wait<S>6633</S> <S>6635</S> upon the service<S>5656</S> of the tabernacle<S>168</S> of the congregation<S>4150</S>: <sup>to: Heb. to war the warfare of, etc</sup>
And from the age<S>1121</S> of fifty<S>2572</S> years<S>8141</S> they shall cease<S>7725</S> waiting<S>6635</S> upon the service<S>5656</S> thereof, and shall serve<S>5647</S> no more: <sup>cease: Heb. return from the warfare of the service</sup>
But shall minister<S>8334</S> with their brethren<S>251</S> in the tabernacle<S>168</S> of the congregation<S>4150</S>, to keep<S>8104</S> the charge<S>4931</S>, and shall do<S>5647</S> no service<S>5656</S>. Thus shalt thou do<S>6213</S> unto the Levites<S>3881</S> touching their charge<S>4931</S>.
